Body:
phys = self.phys
r_tor = 1e-06
self.geo['throat.touch_length'] = 2e-06
phys.add_model(propname='throat.tor_max', model=pm.meniscus.purcell, mode=
    'max', r_toroid=r_tor)
phys.add_model(propname='throat.tor_touch', model=pm.meniscus.purcell, mode
    ='touch', r_toroid=r_tor)
assert np.any(phys['throat.tor_touch'] < phys['throat.tor_max'])
